This is an amazing dupe if you’re looking to save a bit of money without sacrificing style or quality. The dress is perfect for little girls who love to twirl, and it looks beautiful in photos. 评论概述: I Just Received The Dress Today & It Has A Hole.
评论详情: The dress is very beautiful. I purchased last minute for a photo shoot my daughter has in two days. I’m so sad she won’t be able to use it. I’m unable to order it again and for it to get here in time for birthday  photo shoot (I can’t reschedule with out loosing my deposit). It’s very great heavy Quality. My 9 year old daughter wears a size 10-12. She is in the skinny tall side and a Size 10 fit perfect. Not too loose or tight. It also didn’t drag on the floor. Maybe I’ll order again for another event or photo shoot in the future :( ugh so sad. I’m afraid the hole will get bigger and refuse to keep it like that and only get one use out of it.
The Ecru was the perfect muted ivory color and great for some fall photos. My daughter felt gorgeous and the quality of the dress is excellent.
Love this dress! It was perfect in so many ways. Fit, style , price.

For perfect! Color was perfect! Ordering another for her for Easter.
